original_text: And that which the rest of the people gave was twenty thousand drams of gold, and two thousand pound of silver, and threescore and seven priests' garments.
korean_text: 그 나머지 백성은 금 이만 드라크마와 은 이천 마네와 제사장의 의복 육십칠 벌을 드렸느니라

sentences.original_text: And that which the rest of the people gave
was twenty thousand drams of gold
and two thousand pound of silver
and threescore and seven priests' garments
